bursaries.name: NSFAS
bursaries.eligibility: South African citizen/permanent resident; household income ≤ R350,000 p.a.; disability concessions (≤ R600,000); first-time undergrads
bursaries.amounts: Tuition full; accommodation R45,000 max; books R5,200; living allowance R16,500; transport R7,750
bursaries.application: Online via nsfas.org.za; requires myNSFAS account, ID, proof of income

bursaries.name: Sasol Bursary
bursaries.eligibility: SA citizens; STEM fields (Engineering, Sciences); min 70% Math/Science/English; full-time undergrad
bursaries.amounts: Full tuition, accommodation, meals, books; laptop allowance; psychosocial support
bursaries.application: Online at sasolbursaries.com; academic records, motivation letter

bursaries.name: Anglo American Bursary
bursaries.eligibility: SA citizens; Mining/Engineering; min 65% aggregate; rural preference
bursaries.amounts: Full tuition + accommodation + books + stipend + vacation work

bursaries.name: Eskom Bursary Programme
bursaries.eligibility: SA citizens; Engineering/Electrical fields; min 60% Math/Science
bursaries.amounts: Full costs + living allowance + vacation work

bursaries.name: Funza Lushaka Bursary
bursaries.eligibility: SA citizens; Education degrees; min 60% aggregate
bursaries.work_commitment: Teaching for same period as funding received

bursaries.name: ISFAP (Missing Middle)
bursaries.amounts: Full wrap-around: tuition + accommodation + books + stipend + laptop + support

bursaries.name: Allan Gray Orbis Foundation
bursaries.eligibility: Top 10% academic performance; leadership potential; entrepreneurial spirit
bursaries.amounts: Full tuition + accommodation + books + mentorship + entrepreneurship programme

bursaries.name: SAICA Bursary Programme
bursaries.eligibility: CA(SA) pathway; min 65% Math + 70% Accounting; BCom/BAcc studies
bursaries.amounts: Tuition + books + mentorship + articles placement support

bursaries.name: MTN Foundation Bursary
bursaries.eligibility: SA citizens; STEM fields; min 65% average; financial need; Grade 12 or first-year uni
bursaries.amounts: R80,000+ per year covering tuition, books, accommodation
bursaries.application: mtn.co.za/foundation/bursaries; online application with academic records

bursaries.name: Vodacom Bursary Programme
bursaries.eligibility: SA citizens; full-time undergrad in STEM; min 70% in Grade 12 subjects for new students, 65%+ for current uni; financial need
bursaries.amounts: Full funding including tuition, accommodation, meals, books, laptop
bursaries.work_commitment: Vacation work and potential employment opportunities

bursaries.name: MERSETA TVET Stipends
bursaries.eligibility: Unemployed SA citizens; for learnerships/apprenticeships in manufacturing/engineering; min Grade 10 or N1 for technical; TVET/employer partnered
bursaries.amounts: R5,000–R10,000 monthly stipend during program; up to R25,000 for completion
bursaries.deadlines: Ongoing windows; DGYR26 applications by January 17, 2025 for 2026 funding

bursaries.name: Absa Fellowship Bursary
bursaries.eligibility: SA citizens; first-year undergrads; min 65% average; leadership potential; commerce/humanities/STEM
bursaries.amounts: Full tuition, accommodation, books, mentorship; R100,000+ value
bursaries.application: absa.africa/fellowship; online application with leadership portfolio

bursaries.name: Standard Bank Bursary
bursaries.eligibility: SA citizens; financial need; min 65% average; commerce/engineering/sciences
bursaries.amounts: Full tuition, accommodation, books, stipend; R80,000–R120,000 per year
bursaries.work_commitment: Vacation work and graduate program opportunities

bursaries.name: Generation Google Bursary
bursaries.eligibility: SA women in computer science/IT; min 65% average; financial need; undergrad/postgrad

bursaries.name: Nedbank Bursary
bursaries.eligibility: SA citizens; financial need; min 65% average; commerce/engineering/IT
bursaries.amounts: Full tuition, accommodation, books, stipend; R80,000+ per year
bursaries.application: nedbank.co.za/careers/bursaries; online application with financial documentation
bursaries.work_commitment: Vacation work and graduate program opportunities

bursaries.name: Discovery Foundation Bursary
bursaries.eligibility: SA citizens; health sciences/medicine; min 60% average; rural/underserved focus; postgrad preferred but undergrad possible
bursaries.amounts: R100,000–R250,000 per year for tuition, research, travel
bursaries.work_commitment: Research collaboration and rural health service

bursaries.name: PwC Bursary
bursaries.eligibility: SA citizens; CA(SA) path; min 4 distinctions in Matric; BCom/BAcc studies
bursaries.amounts: Full tuition, books, accommodation; R80,000–R120,000 per year
bursaries.work_commitment: Articles and potential employment at PwC

bursaries.name: KPMG Bursary
bursaries.eligibility: SA citizens; CA(SA) path; min 4 distinctions in Matric including LO; 70% Accounting, 65% overall
bursaries.amounts: Full tuition, books, accommodation; R100,000+ per year
bursaries.application: kpmg.co.za/careers/bursaries; academic excellence and leadership focus
bursaries.work_commitment: Articles and potential employment at KPMG

notes: For special needs: Extra allowances in NSFAS/ISFAP. Track deadlines annually. TVET Coverage: NSFAS (full), MERSETA (stipends), Funza Lushaka (teacher training). Private Institution Coverage: Allan Gray, SAICA, Absa cover accredited private institutions.
